title: Spirit Guard Stances
body: so recently i was playing with friends as Udyr, i have the legendary skin and i noticed that he would only do the bear taunt and joke, no matter the form he was in, i remember when he came out, he had at least 4 jokes/taunts, one for each form, now he only has one

replies.body: Thanks for the report! We're currently working on a fix! :]

A bit unrelated to the OP's bug but related to Udyr's Spirit Guard stances... Are the casting animations supposed to randomly halt an in-progress Auto Attack? (seemingly random as its been inconsistent) 

I'm going to specifically test some of this out later tonight and might be able to get a video but I also wanted to note that I don't notice this occurring with his regular skins.

yeah i get that a lot too. it really affects tiger stance Udyr, and *really* afftects top lane Udyr. When you get the stun off you want to get the tiger dot on them pronto, but Udyr just sits there menacingly, offering a small window of opportunity before finally applying that 230 + (260% AD). I've had to give up on kills and take turret shots just because of this delayed reaction
